acts.what: AATT with HTML CodeSniffer WCAG 2.1 AA ruleset

result.msg: This element's text or background contains transparency. Ensure the contrast ratio between the text and background are at least 4.5:1.
Img element missing an alt attribute. Use the alt attribute to specify a short text alternative.
Img element is marked so that it is ignored by Assistive Technology.

result.msg: Heading markup should be used if this content is intended as a heading.
